title: Household items 1
sentences: Keep the milk in the fridge so it doesn't spoil.
Heat the soup in the microwave for two minutes.
El pollo está casi listo en el
The chicken is almost ready in the oven.
Pon los platos sucios en el
Put the dirty dishes in the dishwasher, please.
I use a frying pan to fry the eggs.
es muy grande para hacer caldo.
The pot is very big for making broth.
Can you pass me a glass to drink water?
I broke a plate while washing the dishes.
Cut the meat with that sharp knife.
Take a spoon to eat the yogurt.
Poke the potato with the fork.
Clean your mouth with the napkin.
We all sit at the table to have dinner.
es un poco incómoda para trabajar.
This chair is a bit uncomfortable for working.
I fell asleep on the sofa watching TV.
del salón es de color gris.
The living room rug is gray.
Turn off the television and go to sleep.
Look at yourself in the hallway mirror before leaving.
I like to take a cold shower in summer.
The bathtub is full of hot water.
Wash your hands in the sink.
está al fondo a la derecha.
The toilet is at the end on the right.
I use soap with a coconut scent.
Wash your hair with this new shampoo.
I need a dry towel for my hair.
Me lavo los dientes con el
I wash my teeth with the electric brush.
I comb my hair with a wooden comb.
Use the dryer if you have wet hair.
dice que he ganado un kilo.
The scale says I've gained a kilo.
Close the tap to not waste water.
Open the curtains so the sun comes in.
I hung a new painting on the wall.
del salón se ha quedado sin pilas.
The living room clock has run out of batteries.
Turn on the lamp to read better.
